title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: When using Photon, there is a bug where the popup menu does not appear when right clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor.
OB:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler.
   >> The popup menu to add breakpoints/marks, etc. should appear, but it does not.
EB: When right clicking on the left vertical ruler in a Java editor, the expected behavior is that a popup menu should appear with options to add breakpoints/marks. This behavior is not currently occurring in Photon.
SR:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler.
   >> The popup menu to add breakpoints/marks, etc. should appear, but it does not.
